artifacts.summary: MCS-membership box semantics is mathematically sound; not a cheat. The two truth predicates differ structurally but yield equivalent completeness results via the soundness chain. Bridge theorem to formally unify them is achievable.

Removal plan for bmcs_valid_mcs: 3 defs + 11 theorems to delete from ChainBundleBFMCS.lean (lines 350-691). All _mcs code is self-contained with zero external dependents. Keep CanonicalBC construction (lines 1-349). Standard completeness chain retains sorry in fully_saturated_bfmcs_exists_int.
